message: Let's be fair, I'll take 90% and you can have 10%. This way we both get something, and I'll be generous and let you go first in the next round.
I'll give you a smaller share, but I still think I deserve more. Your turn to negotiate!
Let's split it evenly this time.  We've both had our chances to be greedy,  and I think a fair split is the best way to end this.
